languages.text: "Хороший же совет ты мне дал, Соломон. Зря я тебя послушал{mf||а}".
"What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."
languages.original_text: "Хороший же совет ты мне дал, Соломон. Зря я тебя послушал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "What great advice you offered me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."
"What great advice you offered me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."
"What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."
"What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."
"What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."
"What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

languages.text: 「素晴らしいアドバイスだったよ、ソロモーン。君の言うことなんか、聞くべきじゃなかったな」
languages.original_text: "What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしいアドバイスだったよ、ソロモーン。君の言うことなんか、聞くべきじゃなかったな」

languages.text: "Einen wirklich tollen Rat habt Ihr mir da gegeben, Solomorne. Ich hätte nicht auf Euch hören sollen."
languages.original_text: "What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

traits.locale_text: "Einen wirklich tollen Rat habt Ihr mir da gegeben, Solomorne. Ich hätte nicht auf Euch hören sollen."

languages.text: « Merci pour votre excellent conseil, Solomorne... Je n'aurais pas dû vous écouter. »
languages.original_text: "What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour votre excellent conseil, Solomorne... Je n'aurais pas dû vous écouter. »

languages.text: «Qué buen consejo el suyo, Solomorne. No debí hacerle caso».
languages.original_text: "What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

traits.locale_text: «Qué buen consejo el suyo, Solomorne. No debí hacerle caso».

languages.text: “你当初的建议可真是太棒了，索罗蒙，我就知道不该听你的。”
languages.original_text: "What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

traits.locale_text: “你当初的建议可真是太棒了，索罗蒙，我就知道不该听你的。”

languages.text: "Verdiğin tavsiye bizi harika bir duruma soktu Solomorne. Seni dinlememeliydim."
languages.original_text: "What fantastic advice you gave me, Solomorne. I should not have listened to you."

traits.locale_text: "Verdiğin tavsiye bizi harika bir duruma soktu Solomorne. Seni dinlememeliydim."
